comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Spelling on negative is Shepard, which certainly suggests this is Sheppard from Texas. www.tsl.state.tx.us/exhibits/suffrage/comesofage/sheppard... looks to be the same man.

comment.author: 33593953@N02
comment._content: It also looks like the same man identified as Sheppard in one of our other photojournalism collections (National Photo Company collection): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/npcc.20452 . We'll adjust the description(s!) and reload to Flickr. Thanks!
